ARABIC: مَّنْ خَشِىَ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلْبٍ مُّنِيبٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: those who fear the All-Merciful in the Unseen and come with a contrite heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Who feared Ar-Rahman in secret, and came with a penitent heart:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: to everyone who feared the Merciful One though He is beyond the reach of perception, to everyone who has come with a heart ever wont to turn (to Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: feared the Beneficent God in secret, and turned to Him with a repenting heart".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Who fears the Most Gracious without seeing, and came with a heart that inclines.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Who feared Ar-Rahman unseen and brought a heart turned in repentance."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Who fears the Beneficent Allah in secret and comes with a penitent heart:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Whosoever fears the All-merciful in the Unseen, and comes with a penitent heart:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Who feareth the Beneficent in secret and cometh with a contrite heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: who fears the Compassionate One, though He is unseen, and comes to Him with a penitent heart;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: That feareth the Compassionate in the unseen and cometh to Him with a heart penitent:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: who fears the All-beneficent in secret and comes with a penitent heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Who feared (Allah) Most Gracious Unseen, and brought a heart turned in devotion (to Him):
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Who feared the Most Beneficent (Allah) in the Ghaib (unseen): (i.e. in this worldly life before seeing and meeting Him), and brought a heart turned in repentance (to Him - and absolutely free from each and every kind of polytheism),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Whosoever fears the Merciful in the Unseen, and comes with a contrite heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Who inwardly feared the Most Gracious, and came with a repentant heart.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Who feared the Most Merciful unseen and came with a heart returning [in repentance].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [50:33] who fears the Compassionate One [while He is] in the Unseen, [the one who] fears Him without having seen Him, and comes with a penitent heart’, [a heart] eagerly applying itself to obedience of Him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Who feareth the Beneficent in secret) who strives for the Beneficent even he has not seen Him (and cometh with a contrite heart) sincere in his worship and profession of Allah's divine Oneness.
